UserPicker.title: Who should be affected by karma?

Faces.label: Faces
Faces.hint: The number of faces of the die.

Inequality.label: Inequality
Inequality.hint: Sets when the Karma should be triggered, based on the given inequality.

hint.average: If the average of the last {number} rolls is...

Floor.label: Next Roll Floor
Floor.hint: ...the next die roll will be {number} or higher.

Nudge.label: Next Roll Adjustment
Nudge.hint: ...the next die roll and each following roll will be adjusted by {number}{cumulatively} ({number}, {number2}, {number3}...), until the average is {term} or equal than {threshold}.

Cumulative.label: Cumulative Adjustment
Cumulative.hint: Sets if the following roll adjusment will accumulate.
